org.springframework.jmx.export.annotation

注释类型 ManagedOperationParameter


  • @Target(value=METHOD)
 @Retention(value=RUNTIME)
 @Documented
 @Repeatable(value=ManagedOperationParameters.class)
public @interface ManagedOperationParameter
    Method-level annotation used to provide metadata about operation parameters, corresponding to a ManagedOperationParameter attribute. Used as part of a ManagedOperationParameters annotation.

    As of Spring Framework 4.2.4, this annotation is declared as repeatable.

    从以下版本开始:
    1.2
    另请参阅:
    ManagedOperationParameters.value(), ManagedOperationParameter

    • 必需元素概要

      所需元素 
      限定符和类型 必需的元素和说明
      String description 
      String name 

    • 元素详细资料

      • name

        public abstract String name

      • description

        public abstract String description
